episodes.synopsis: Iain Stewart visits Vietnamese caves and African deserts to see how plants first harnessed light from the sun and created our life-giving atmosphere.
episodes.title: Life from Light

episodes.synopsis: Iain Stewart explores how flowers have transformed Earth, bringing brilliant color to our planet and driving the evolution of all animals.
episodes.title: The Power of Flowers

episodes.synopsis: Iain Stewart explores the impact of grass on Earth and how this one plant transformed life in the oceans and sparked human civilization.
episodes.title: The Challenger

video.title: How to Grow a Planet
video.synopsis: This documentary series reveals how plants, and not humans, are the most crucial living thing on Earth, with the power to both sustain and destroy us.
